trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Określa kontroler wydruku, który wyświetla dokument na ekranie jako serię obrazów.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj funkcja podglądu wydruku, można utworzyć wystąpienia <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>lub <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasy i ustawić jej <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: PreviewPrintController jest używany przez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klas, chociaż PreviewPrintController można użyć w przypadku zarządzania wyświetlania okna podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku użycia z <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>lub <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, ustawia PreviewPrintController <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>skojarzonego <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, wykonuje podglądu wydruku i ustawia <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>do oryginalnej wartości.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wyświetleniem w trakcie podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat drukowania, zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Omówienie przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Przechwytuje stron dokumentu jako serię obrazów.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>obrazów zawartych w reprezentacji <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>implementacji formularza podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Tablica typu <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> zawierający na stronach <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> jako serię obrazów.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy ten kontroler jest używane dla podglądu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak podejrzeć stronę dokumentu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnEndPage jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wyjątek wewnątrz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzenia <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, ta metoda nie jest wywoływana.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wyświetleniem w trakcie podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Czyści w metodzie OnEndPage <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący przeglądany dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane dotyczące sposobu podejrzeć stronę dokumentu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wyświetlanie podglądu wydruku dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana bezpośrednio po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Nawet jeśli nieprzechwycony wyjątek został zgłoszony podczas procesu podglądu wydruku, jest nazywany OnEndPrint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wyświetleniem w trakcie podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy metoda OnEndPrint zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący przeglądany dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane dotyczące sposobu wyświetlania podglądu wydruku dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak podejrzeć stronę dokumentu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPage jest wywoływana bezpośrednio przed <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wyświetleniem w trakcie podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana metoda OnStartPage zestawów <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Wygładzanie określane również jako szarego skalowanie sprawia, że podglądu wydruku lepsze.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Jednak użycie wygładzanie może spowolnić renderowania.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat wygładzanie zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący przeglądany dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane dotyczące sposobu podejrzeć stronę dokumentu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Początkowo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> właściwość ten parametr będzie <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Wartość zwrócona przez tę metodę będzie służyć do ustawienia tej właściwości.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> reprezentujący stronę z <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wyświetlanie podglądu wydruku dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wyświetleniem w trakcie podglądu wydruku.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po wywołaniu OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint sprawdza, czy ustawienia drukarki są poprawne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący przeglądany dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane o tym, jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Drukarki o nazwie w <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> właściwość nie istnieje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość wskazującą, czy używany wygładzanie podczas wyświetlania podglądu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Wygładzanie, znanej także jako szary skalowania, używa kilka odcieni szarości wokół obszarów, krzywych i ukośne podziały tekstu umożliwiają płynniejszy wyglądu tekstu.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Podczas przy użyciu Wygładzanie sprawia, że podglądu wydruku lepsze, może to spowolnić szybkość renderowania.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli podglądu wydruku używa wygładzanie; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Wartość domyślna to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
